description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Up to 4 players compete in a classic falling block style game, only this time players interact with each other by completing lines containing attack blocks. 20 unique attack blocks can change the game in an instant.
description.short: Up to 4 players compete in a classic falling block style game, only this time players interact with each other by completing lines containing attack blocks. 20 unique attack blocks can change the game in an instant.
